= Installation =

  # First download the framework via SVN repository.
  # Extract the package to a folder of your choice below the document root of your webserver.
  # *./main/temp* (and all subfolders) have to be readable & writable by the web server user. If you have more than one project you have to repeat this step for each of them.
  # You are done.

== Requirements ==

  * Webserver (mod_rewrite recommend but not necessary)
  * PHP >= 5
